header_text: You see from social media stories that a group of your colleagues are hanging out together. You weren't invited, and it looks like they're having a great time. Your colleagues probably didn't invite you because they forgot.

elements.Text: Did your colleagues exclude you on purpose?

elements.name: You see from social media stories that a group of your colleagues are hanging out together. You weren't invited, and it looks like they're having a great time. Your colleagues probably didn't invite you because they forgot._Social Situations_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
